mapper.select: SELECT count(a.apy_sq) 지원완료, a.rsm_sq 이력서번호, r.mbr_sq 회원번호 FROM p2_tbl_resume_m as r inner join p2_tbl_apply_h as a on a.rsm_sq = r.rsm_sq and r.mbr_sq=#{id}
select mbr_sq from p2_tbl_member_m where mbr_id = #{id}

SELECT a.apy_sq, a.rsm_sq, r.mbr_sq, r.rsm_tl, j.jbp_tl, Date(a.apy_dtm) as apy_dtm, j.jbp_cndtn, e.entrprs_name, c.code_name, (select count(a_inner.jbp_sq) from p2_tbl_apply_h as a_inner where a_inner.jbp_sq = j.jbp_sq and apy_cndtn != '403') as apply_count FROM p2_tbl_resume_m as r inner join p2_tbl_apply_h as a on a.rsm_sq = r.rsm_sq and r.mbr_sq = #{mbrSq} inner join p2_tbl_job_posting_m as j on a.jbp_sq = j.jbp_sq inner join p2_tbl_enterprise_member_m as e on e.entrprs_sq = j.entrprs_sq inner join p2_tbl_common_code_dtl_s as c on c.code_id = a.apy_cndtn order by a.apy_dtm desc

SELECT a.apy_sq, a.rsm_sq, r.mbr_sq, r.rsm_tl, j.jbp_tl, DATE(a.apy_dtm) AS apy_dtm, j.jbp_cndtn, e.entrprs_name, c.code_name, (SELECT COUNT(a_inner.jbp_sq) FROM p2_tbl_apply_h AS a_inner WHERE a_inner.jbp_sq = j.jbp_sq AND a_inner.apy_cndtn != '403') AS apply_count FROM p2_tbl_resume_m AS r INNER JOIN p2_tbl_apply_h AS a ON a.rsm_sq = r.rsm_sq AND r.mbr_sq = #{mbrSq} INNER JOIN p2_tbl_job_posting_m AS j ON a.jbp_sq = j.jbp_sq INNER JOIN p2_tbl_enterprise_member_m AS e ON e.entrprs_sq = j.entrprs_sq INNER JOIN p2_tbl_common_code_dtl_s AS c ON c.code_id = a.apy_cndtn WHERE
j.jbp_tl LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
r.rsm_tl LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
order by a.apy_dtm desc
select count(a.apy_sq) from p2_tbl_apply_h as a inner join p2_tbl_resume_m as r on a.rsm_sq = r.rsm_sq and a.apy_cndtn!='403' and r.mbr_sq=#{mbrSq}
update p2_tbl_apply_h set apy_cndtn ='403' where apy_sq = #{apySq}
select count(a.apy_cndtn) from p2_tbl_apply_h as a inner join p2_tbl_resume_m as r on a.rsm_sq = r.rsm_sq where a.apy_cndtn!='403' and a.apy_cndtn='401' and r.mbr_sq=#{mbrSq}
select count(a.apy_cndtn) from p2_tbl_apply_h as a inner join p2_tbl_resume_m as r on a.rsm_sq = r.rsm_sq where a.apy_cndtn not in ('403','401') and r.mbr_sq=#{mbrSq}
